library(dplyr)

# List of The Incomparable episodes with missing metadata

Note on what I mean by "topic" and "category":
![](http://dump.jemu.name/MoVpb.png)

```{r, echo=F}
incomparable_wide <- readRDS("data/incomparable_wide.rds")

incomparable_wide %>% filter(topic == "Not provided" | category == "Not provided") %>%
  select(number, date, title, category, topic, host) %>%
  datatable(filter = "top", options = list(pageLength = 100, autoWidth = TRUE)) %>%
  formatDate(columns = "date", method = "toLocaleDateString")
```
